attributes.action: Make Jamie De Bootman the next Prime Minister (when he's old enough)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am going to ask the Prime Minister if I can become the next Prime Minister. I know it may be slightly big-headed, but I was voted as the most friendly, and trustworthy person 4 years running in my old school, I am looking for a job in London when I'm older, and I would like to be famous. I am 14 years old, and very happy to step in as soon as I can. I am also very down to earth, and listen to every persons opinion before anything is done.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
